about_the_game:
Ancient folk tale comes to life and unexpectedly, village trip to grandfather’s house turns into a deadly nightmare. Unleash the mystery of mountains with Demetre by travelling and meeting new people. Dive into a wild forest, hunt down animals, sell the meat and obtain money.

“Veiled Tales” is an immersive adventure game set in a picturesque Georgian mountain village. In this 3rd person modern time game, you'll experience Georgia by fitting in Demetre's character. Players immerse themselves in the charm of Georgia’s architecture and language as spoken by the characters. Players' objective is to ultimately reveal secret of Demetre's brother's disappearance. Throughout the journey he faces diverse difficulties and obstacles, helps out villagers, gathers information and acquires ancient, inherited weapon.

The first project by Georgian Game Development startup "Surreal Genesis". With this modest-size project we sincerely showcase our abilities as a starting point in this field. This is only the beginning of our long, indefatigable and hard journey. Stay tuned!

content_descriptors.notes: Game involves hunting down wild animals and weapon combat scenes.

short_description: "Veiled Tales" is an adventure game set in Georgia's high mountain village. The story revolves around an ancient tale, guiding the main character, Demetre, through crucial decisions. Immerse yourself in a wild world of deception, where uncovering secrets and mysteries becomes a fight for life.
